Deutsch: chin. Halsgeige, chin. Schandkragen  (hölzerne Hals-Hand-Fessel)  (S, Rechtsw)
English: cangue (wooden collar like stocks used to restrain and punish criminals in China)

d.f: `古時~`套~`在~`犯人~`脖子~`上~`的~`刑具~。`用~`木板~`製成~。

English: cangue (wooden collar like stocks used to restrain and punish criminals in China)
